BushTripInjector.ChangeLog:
0.6.5.884: Feature: Added an Update-Check on startup to reduce the number of different BTI versions to support Bug-Fix: Added a check for valid flightplan BTI can handle (min. 2 Entries, Dep- and Dest must be an airport) 0.6.6.889: User-Request: For Landing detections, you can now choose yourself which parameters in any combination are to be used for ending the leg.
0.6.7.903: User-Request: Added SimVar "PLANE TOUCHDOWN NORMAL VELOCITY" to Event+Triggers Editor. With this you can now create events depending on the touchdown rate in ft/min. User-Request: No more horizontal scrolling on long Intro-Texts User-Request: Added SimVar "VERTICAL SPEED" with ft/min in addition to ft/sec to Event+Triggers Editor Enhancement: Workaround for an Sim-Bug when Mission-Failure Texts have chars outside of ASCII-7. BTI converts those text now to ASCII-7 by v13 of Unicode Standard Fix: Fixed an issue when invalid values for the window positions were being stored in BushTripInjector.ini
